SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.repositories

Interface LendingRecordRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<LendingRecord>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<LendingRecord,Integer>
@Repository public interface LendingRecordRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<LendingRecord,Integer>
Repository interface for managing LendingRecord entities. Provides methods for CRUD operations and custom queries related to lending records.

      Optional<LendingRecord> findLendingRecordById(int id)
      Finds a lending record by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the lending record
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found record or empty if not found

      Retrieves all lending records with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status to search for
      Returns:
      list of lending records matching the status

      Finds all lending records associated with a specific game owner.

    • findByStartDateBetween

      List<LendingRecord> findByStartDateBetween(Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Finds all lending records with start dates within a specified range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the beginning of the date range
      endDate - the end of the date range
      Returns:
      list of lending records within the date range

    • findByEndDateBeforeAndStatus

      List<LendingRecord> findByEndDateBeforeAndStatus(Date date, LendingRecord.LendingStatus status)
      Finds all lending records that have passed their end date and have a specific status.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to compare against end dates
      status - the status to filter by
      Returns:
      list of lending records matching the criteria

    • findByRequest_Requester

      List<LendingRecord> findByRequest_Requester(Account requester)
      Finds all lending records associated with a specific borrower. Changed from findByRequest_Borrower to findByRequest_Requester to match BorrowRequest model
      Parameters:
      requester - the borrower account to search for
      Returns:
      list of lending records for the specified borrower
